name: Too Many Weapons
description: Too Many Weapons is a local multiplayer arena combat game where anything and everything is a weapon! Featuring a huge variety of objects, outfits, and maps!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a controller to play
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a controller to play
